description: Code-spec enforcement, codex skill fixes, and add_session robustness
changelog:
**Bug Fixes:**
- fix(templates): tolerate formatted markdown in add_session.py table separator matching — `startswith("|---")` replaced with `re.match(r"^\|\s*-", line)` to handle formatters adding spaces
- fix(codex): replace `/trellis:xxx` with `$xxx` syntax in codex skill templates (finish-work, update-spec, start)
- fix(codex): remove Claude Code-specific `Task()`, `subagent_type`, `model: "opus"` references from codex start skill

**Enhancements:**
- feat(codex): add codex platform support to local cli_adapter.py (config dir, detect, command path)
- docs(code-spec): enforce executable spec requirements — add Step 1.5 Code-Spec Depth Requirement to start, Section 2.5 Hard Block to finish-work, 7-section structure to update-spec
- docs(templates): sync code-spec requirements to all 5 platform command templates

**Testing:**
- test(regression): add [rc.2] regression test for add_session.py table separator fix
notes: No migration required. Fixes and enhancements are template-level only.
